CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: CDT Environmental Technology Investment Holdings Limited

Address.label: Address
Address.value: C1C1, 4TH FLOOR, BUILDING 1,FINANCIAL BASE, NO. 8 KEFA ROAD, NANSHAN, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CDT, headquartered in Shenzhen, China, is a waste treatment company that designs, develops, manufactures, sells, installs, operates and maintains sewage treatment systems and provides sewage treatment services in China. For more information, visit CDT's website at https://www.cdthb.cn.
